name: LumaCore
description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: ACOM
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Competition
Among small power plants, ACOM’s LumaCore consistently ranks among the best for its power rate, cool rate, and high overheat temperature. That’s why if you value your ship’s performance over anything else, this competition-grade component is perfect for you.
description_cn:
物品类型：发电机
制造商：ACOM
尺寸：1
等级：A
类别：竞赛
在小型发电机中，ACOM的亮度核心在功率，冷却速率和过热温度方面一直名列前茅。因此，如果您把飞船的性能看的比其他任何东西都更重，那么这个竞赛级别的组件非常适合您。
